DOC.brief_summary: To determine overall objective response rate pegylated liposomal doxorubicin （Lipo-Dox）combined cyclophosphamide/5-FU second-line treatment patient metastatic breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Lipo-dox Cyclophosphamide /5-Fluorouracil Patients With Metastatic Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: histologically prove breast cancer metastatic disease life expectancy le 3 month .
